title: Latest Philips Hue update adds some cool new scenes
content:
Those of you who own Philips smart LED lights would probably be familiar with the Philips Hue mobile app. The companion app lets you organize, control, and customize your smart lights and accessories. The app received a big visual overhaul last year that greatly simplified the user interface by bringing quick access to scenes, brightness,

The post Latest Philips Hue update adds some cool new scenes appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest Philips Hue app update introduces two new scene categories: "Futuristic" and "Lush." Read on to know more.
